author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-4560: xslt component will now ensure underlying stream is closed for Source. For example on windows this would otherwise lock files.

author: eyang
msg: AMBARI-92. Added logic to retry heartbeat sending. (Eric Yang)

author: ihabunek
msg: Added a helper warn() method to appenders.

author: hlship
msg: TAP5-1708: Add ability to control where Ajax-injected CSS links are placed
One pixel error (':' instead of '.') for the case where there is no injection point resulted in undefined exceptions when an Ajax partial page render injected a CSS stylesheet.
